title: Change Theme from Dark to Light
description: Update the Open Mazad application from dark theme to light theme by changing colors, backgrounds, and component styles

stories.title: Update global CSS colors
stories.description: Change the root CSS variables in globals.css from dark to light colors
testSteps: Verify background color is now white/light instead of dark
Verify text colors are dark instead of white

stories.title: Update Tailwind config colors
stories.description: Update tailwind.config.ts to use light theme as default
testSteps: Verify tailwind config has light-friendly color palette

stories.title: Update page.tsx dark classes to light
stories.description: Replace dark: classes and dark color classes (bg-black, bg-gray-900, text-white) with light equivalents

stories.title: Update component styles
stories.description: Update LightRays and other components to work with light theme
testSteps: LightRays should be visible against light background
All glassmorphism effects should work on light backgrounds
